numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that MLB has the smallest number of players who are people of color.
2. I notice that the men's NBA has the largest number of players who are people of color.
3. I notice that the men's NBA has the largest number of coaches who are people of color.
4. I wonder if some sport has more coaches who are people of color than another sport.
5. I wonder if a higher number of coaches who are people of color relates to a higher number of athletes who are people of color.
7. Many people of color cannot look up to people of color in their sport of choice.
8. The percentage of people of color who coach is very low.
9. The percentage of people of color who play is very low.
10. This graph shows the percentage of coaches of color in the major sports leagues.
11. This graph also shows the percentage of players of color in the major sports leagues.
12. The question is: Are people of color equally represented in professional sports?
